entities.name: uncle vernon
entities.description: Uncle Vernon is mentioned as reacting with horror and questioning Dudley about hearing voices. He is described as having a white face and tears in his eyes.

entities.name: aunt petunia
entities.description: Aunt Petunia is mentioned as reacting with horror and questioning Dudley about hearing voices. She is described as being very white-faced and having tears in her eyes.

entities.name: dudley
entities.description: Dudley is mentioned as possibly losing his mind due to hearing voices from Dementors. He is described as shuddering and unable to speak about what he heard.

entities.name: harry
entities.description: Harry is mentioned as feeling a sense of numb dread since the arrival of the first owl. He also feels curiosity about what Dudley would have been forced to hear from Dementors.

entities.name: dementors
entities.description: Dementors are mentioned as causing people to relive their worst moments and hearing voices.

relationships.description: Uncle Vernon and Aunt Petunia share a look of utter horror, indicating they are reacting similarly to the situation with Dudley.
Dudley's situation is causing concern for Harry, as evidenced by his feeling a sense of numb dread and curiosity about what Dudley would have been forced to hear from Dementors.
Dudley is interacting with Dementors, which are causing him to hear voices and potentially lose his mind.
